description: This file defines React functional components used for UI placeholders and notices, including a loading skeleton, error message, and empty state display.

methods.name: LoadingBlock({ lines = 3 })
methods.description: A React component that displays a loading skeleton with a specified number of lines.

methods.name: ErrorNotice({ title = "Something went wrong", message, onRetry })
methods.description: A React component that shows an error notice with optional retry button.

methods.name: EmptyState({ title = "No results", message = "Try adjusting your filters." })
methods.description: A React component that displays an empty state message.

ctags.name: EmptyState
ctags.pattern: /^export function EmptyState({ title = "No results", message = "Try adjusting your filters." }) {$/
ctags.signature: ({ title = "No results", message = "Try adjusting your filters." })

ctags.name: ErrorNotice
ctags.pattern: /^export function ErrorNotice({ title = "Something went wrong", message, onRetry }) {$/
